Title: Still Positive
Plot: Carrie turns the tables on the mastermind of the Langley bombing, but recruiting one of Iran?s most powerful operatives has dangerous consequences. Meanwhile, Saul struggles to keep an intrusive Senator Lockhart at bay, and Dana makes a radical decision that will change the Brody family forever.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
